title: DeSantis defends math textbook rejection as Dems seek proof of critical race theory lessons - POLITICO
content:
1. DeSantis defends math textbook rejection as Dems seek proof of critical race theory lessons  POLITICO
  2. Florida rejects math textbooks that contain critical race theory  Fox News
  3. Gov. Ron DeSantis Standing By Florida Department Of Education's Decision To Reject More Than 50 Math  CBS Miami
  4. The dark, scary road of censorship in Florida | Letters to the editor  South Florida Sun Sentinel
  5. DeSantis Warns That Math Makes Children Gay  The New Yorker
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Florida Education Department officials have not yet provided examples from textbooks deemed “impermissible” but on Monday released the list of books that failed to make the cut.
